Remember, JP, the bot limit per ship is 3 bots.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., JP3884@a... wrote:
>        Megatron looked at Scorpinox's small shuttle. "Well, are we 
going to 
> see this disk and your master, or shall we stand here and meeet an 
icy death?"
> 
>        Tarantulas made his way as fast as possible to a small work 
lab. He 
> had monitored Killfest's little team go to the Ark to destroy, or 
mabey to 
> arrest, the bodies of the Autobots. There was no way that the 
Predacons, the 
> true Predacons, were going to let Killfest wrap his rebal hands 
around them.
>        "Haha, no way that Ark is ever going to be turned over to 
that scum! I 
> will go myslef and sabotage there whole little operation...."
>        Little did Tarantulas know as he was constructing a small 
yet suitable 
> craft that would get him to the Ark, Ominous Prime and his minions 
had 
> already launched off, destination: the Ark and total control over 
these 
> inferior transformers.
> 
>        Hell Beast looked to Shockwave. "Yes, please, tell me, when 
can we 
> start this Empire? And who shall be the emporer?"
